item.title: BME280 Sensor
item.description: BME280 Sensor (temp, humidity, pressure) via Pi4J, I2C, and JBang GITHUB PROJECT: github.com/Pi4J/pi4j-jbang > Pi4JTempHumPressI2C.java and github.com/Pi4J/pi4j-jbang > Pi4JTempHumPressSpi.java Intro Before proceeding with this example, make sure that you have a Raspberry Pi prepared to execute Java code with JBang as explained here. This is an example project to demonstrate how to read the temperature, humidity and pressure from a BME280 sensor, installed on an Adafruit board that can be controlled via I2C and SPI.
